meanings.definition: To concentrate on a particular subject or activity.
meanings.sent1: She was focusing on her homework to finish it quickly.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys focusing on his favorite book every evening.
meanings.sent3: The cat was focusing intently on a moving laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The detective was focusing on finding the missing clue.
meanings.sent5: By focusing on her breathing, she calmed her nerves before the speech.

meanings.definition: The act of adjusting the lens of a camera or microscope to make an image clear.
meanings.sent1: The photographer's focusing made the picture sharp and bright.
meanings.sent2: He checked the focusing of the microscope before starting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The focusing of the camera lens was crucial for capturing the perfect shot.
meanings.sent4: The focusing ring on the camera helped adjust the image clarity.
meanings.sent5: With precise focusing, the details in the photograph became vivid.

meanings.definition: The process of directing attention or effort towards a specific goal or objective.
meanings.sent1: The team's focusing on the project led to its successful completion.
meanings.sent2: Her focusing on her studies paid off with excellent grades.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's focusing on gathering nuts was interrupted by a passing bird.
meanings.sent4: The company's focusing on customer satisfaction improved its reputation.
meanings.sent5: Through clear focusing on the target, he achieved his desired outcome.
